page.description: Expanding Menu Tree - Global Settings Properties

section.title: Menu color
section.description: The menu color is the color shown for the top level menu items. Child menu items are shown in a color that is computed automatically as a lighter shade of the menu color.

description.p: Defines the background color for the space below the bottom of the expanding menu control. By default, this property is set to *[ui:<Same as Menu Color>]* which will use the color defined in the *[ui:Menu color]* property.

section.title: Text color type
section.description: Specify the text color for the text on each menu item. If you select <Auto>, the text color is computed automatically so that it is readable against the selected menu color.

item.name: Auto
item.description: A contrasting text color is automatically computed so the text is readable against the menu background color.

item.name: Custom
item.description: If chosen, a custom text color can be specified.

section.title: Text color
section.description: The text color to use. Only available if the *[ui:Text color type]* is set to "Custom".

section.title: Indent
section.description: Specify how many pixels each level in the menu should be indented.
